${ModID}:TallForm.NAME: tall form
${ModID}:TallForm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|@=ethereal. NL |>0=}whenever you play a card, apply !M! ${ModID}:encheesed to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Rummage.NAME: rummage
${ModID}:Rummage.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage. NL shuffle !M! ${ModID}:junk into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Litterpicking.NAME: litterpicking
${ModID}:Litterpicking.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage. NL shuffle !M! ${ModID}:junk into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Scrabble.NAME: scrabble
${ModID}:Scrabble.DESCRIPTION: {@@}deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:NimbleStrike.NAME: nimble strike
${ModID}:NimbleStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}deal !D! damage. NL discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your draw pile.

${ModID}:Dart.NAME: dart
${ModID}:Dart.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ${ModID}:wreck !${ModID}:m2!: apply !M! weak to them.

${ModID}:RashPounce.NAME: rash pounce
${ModID}:RashPounce.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL discard your hand.

${ModID}:RiskyManoeuvre.NAME: risky manoeuvre
${ModID}:RiskyManoeuvre.DESCRIPTION: {@@}deal !D! damage. NL shuffle !${ModID}:m2! *splinter{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s} into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Mine.NAME: mine!
${ModID}:Mine.DESCRIPTION: gain !B! block. NL add !M! ${ModID}:junk to your hand.

${ModID}:Scurry.NAME: scurry
${ModID}:Scurry.DESCRIPTION: {@@}gain !B! block. NL discard !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:wreck !${ModID}:m3!: draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Ratflip.NAME: ratflip
${ModID}:Ratflip.DESCRIPTION: gain !B! block. NL apply !M! ${ModID}:encheesed and vulnerable.

${ModID}:RecyclingBin.NAME: recycling bin
${ModID}:RecyclingBin.DESCRIPTION: discard your hand. NL add !M! ${ModID}:junk to your hand for each card discarded.

${ModID}:Careen.NAME: careen
${ModID}:Careen.DESCRIPTION: add !M! ${ModID}:junk to your hand. NL ${ModID}:wreck !${ModID}:m2!: play a *vault. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:Exude.NAME: exude
${ModID}:Exude.DESCRIPTION: {@@}apply double ${ModID}:encheesed the next !M! time{!M!|>1=s} you apply it.

${ModID}:TakeAWhiff.NAME: take a whiff
${ModID}:TakeAWhiff.DESCRIPTION: {@@}draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL gain [E] equal to the number of ${ModID}:junk in your hand. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:SurpriseShiv.NAME: surprise shiv
${ModID}:SurpriseShiv.DESCRIPTION: retain. NL deal !D! damage. NL increase this card's damage by !M! whenever you exhaust a card with this in hand. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:Ratpack.NAME: ratpack
${ModID}:Ratpack.DESCRIPTION: {@@}discard your hand. NL put !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Lazors.NAME: lazors!!
${ModID}:Lazors.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:SteppingStones.NAME: stepping stones
${ModID}:SteppingStones.DESCRIPTION: {@@}whenever you discard a card, ${ModID}:grime it{!M!|>1= !M! times}.

${ModID}:Piddle.NAME: piddle
${ModID}:Piddle.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=innate. NL }${ModID}:grime and discard your draw pile. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:SqueezeThrough.NAME: squeeze through
${ModID}:SqueezeThrough.DESCRIPTION: {@@}add !${ModID}:m2! *splinter{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s} into your hand. NL gain !B! block.

${ModID}:Empty.NAME: empty
${ModID}:Empty.DESCRIPTION: shuffle !M! ${ModID}:junk into your draw pile. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:Hoard.NAME: hoard
${ModID}:Hoard.DESCRIPTION: at the end of combat, choose 1 of !M! ${ModID}:junk to add to your deck.
